common.error_project-already-exists: A project with this name already exists.
common.no-mobile: To use Infisical, please log in through a device with larger dimensions.
common.maintenance-alert: We are experiencing minor technical difficulties. We are working on solving it right now. Please come back in a few minutes.
common.project-id-description: To integrate Infisical into your code base and get automatic injection of environmental variables, you should use the following Project ID.
common.drop-zone: Drag and drop your .env file here.
common.drop-zone-keys: Drag and drop your .env file here to add more keys.

login.title: 로그인
login.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage their .env files.

signup.title: 회원가입
signup.og-title: Replace .env files with 1 line of code. Sign Up for Infisical in 3 minutes.
signup.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage API-keys and environemntal variables.  Works with Node.js, Next.js, Gatsby, Nest.js...
signup.step1-privacy: 회원가입시 약관과 개인 정보 보호 정책을 읽고 동의한 것으로 간주합니다.
signup.step2-code-error: 코드가 잘못된 것 같아요. 다시 시도해주세요.
signup.step4-description1: 계정이 잠겼을 경우 비상 키트를 사용하여 로그인할 수 있어요.
signup.step4-description2: 다운로드 후 안전한 곳에 보관하는 것을 추천합니다.
signup.step4-description3: 분실시 접근하거나 복구할 수 없는 시크릿 키가 포함되어 있어요.

meta.title: Dashboard | Infiscal
meta.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage their .env files.

dashboard.personal-description: Personal keys are only visible to you
dashboard.shared-description: Shared keys are visible to your whole team

check-docs.title: Good job!
check-docs.line2: Here is how to connect them to your codebase.

settings-personal.title: 개인 설정
settings-personal.description: 계정 및 기본적인 설정을 확인하고 변경하세요.

emergency.name: 긴급복구 키트
emergency.text1: 긴급복구 키트는 Infisical계정에 로그인 할 수 있는 정보를 가지고 있어요.
emergency.text2: 오직 마지막으로 발급한 긴급복구 키트만 사용 가능해요. 새로운 긴급복구 키트를 받으려면, 비밀번호를 입력하세요.

settings.org-members-description: Manage members of your organization. These users could afterwards be formed into projects.
settings.incident-contacts-description: These contacts will be notified in the unlikely event of a severe incident.
settings.delete-project-note: Note: You can only delete a project in case you have more than one
settings.project-danger-zone-note: As soon as you delete this project, you will not be able to undo it. This will immediately remove all the keys. If you still want to do that, please enter the name of the project below.
settings.service-tokens-description: Every service token is specific to you, a certain project and a certain environment within this project.

billing.title: 요금제 & 결제
billing.description: 이곳에서 조직의 구독을 확인하고 관리할 수 있어요.

starter.text: 어떤 프로젝트든 다섯명의 맴버까지 무료로 이용할 수 있어요!

professional.text: 조직의 성장에 따라 유연하게 시크릿을 관리하세요.

enterprise.text: 조직의 성장에 따라 유연하게 시크릿을 관리하세요.

add-dialog.user-will-email: 유저는 안내가 포함된 메일을 받게 됩니다.
